creator: spillai@smartenergy.com
text:
Created a Web test plan (i.e. A login page with "Once only controller", a 
Search page with "Interleaving Controller", a default Http Request, a Http 
Cookie Manager and a File Reporter). The app. works fine with a single thread 
and 1 to many loop counts. But when I increase the number of threads I don't 
get into the search page, it goes back to the Login page. Looks like there is a 
problem in the Cookies. 

Thanks,
Srini

creator: mstover1@apache.org
text:
I doubt 1.7 has this problem, but in any case, try upgrading to a more recent
version.

Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
jsalvata@atg.com
text: Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
